document.full_text: julie taymor is stepping aside as director of "spider-man: turn off the dark," and will be replaced by philip william mckinley, who previously directed "the boy from oz" and the circus.
document.title: new director for 'spider-man'
lines_and_colors: julie taymor is stepping aside as director of "spider-man: turn off the dark," and will be replaced by philip william mckinley, who previously directed "the boy from oz" and the circus.
